name: part_010
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】3D新衣装お披露目!! 兎田ぺこら生誕祭ライブ♪【ホロライブ⧸兎田ぺこら】 [jgoJuJiWtf4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: Usada Pekora performs "Sugar Song and Bitter Step" with guests Houshou Marine, Shirogane Noel, and Shiranui Flare.
Transition and stage setup for the MC segment.
MC section where Usada Pekora talks with the 3rd generation members (Marine, Noel, Flare) about her birthday and new outfit.
Transition to the next song performance with Usada Pekora on a moving platform.

subtitles.original: Someday 狂騒が息を潜めても
subtitles.english: Someday, even if the frenzy dies down

subtitles.original: Someday 正論に意味がなくなっても
subtitles.english: Someday, even if logic loses its meaning

subtitles.original: Feeling unsung 鳴らし続けることだけが
subtitles.english: Feeling unsung, only the continuous sound...

subtitles.original: 僕たちを僕たちたらしめる証明になる、QED!
subtitles.english: ...becomes the proof that makes us who we are, QED!

subtitles.original: ママレード＆シュガーソング、ピーナッツ＆ビターステップ
subtitles.english: Marmalade & Sugar Song, Peanuts & Bitter Step

subtitles.original: 生きてく理由をそこに映し出せ
subtitles.english: Reflect the reason for living right there

subtitles.original: 北北東は後方へ、その距離が誇らしい
subtitles.english: North-Northeast to the rear, that distance is something to be proud of

subtitles.original: 世界中を驚かせ続けよう
subtitles.english: Let's keep surprising the whole world

subtitles.original: ママレード＆シュガーソング、ピーナッツ＆ビターステップ
subtitles.english: Marmalade & Sugar Song, Peanuts & Bitter Step

subtitles.original: 甘くて苦くて目が回りそうです
subtitles.english: It's sweet and bitter, it's making my head spin

subtitles.original: 南南西を目指してパーティを続けよう
subtitles.english: Head South-Southwest and let's keep the party going

subtitles.original: 世界中を驚かせてしまう夜になる I feel 上々
subtitles.english: It'll be a night that surprises the whole world, I feel great

subtitles.original: 連鎖になってリフレクション Goes On
subtitles.english: Becoming a chain, the reflection goes on

subtitles.original: 一去去って 一指しなって待って一教
subtitles.english: Leaving all at once, becoming one finger, waiting for the best

subtitles.original: Wow Wow...
subtitles.english: Wow Wow...

subtitles.original: 一去去って 一指しなって待って一教
subtitles.english: Leaving all at once, becoming one finger, waiting for the best

subtitles.original: You got happiness, feel some melodies
subtitles.english: You got happiness, feel some melodies

subtitles.original: はぁ〜！ぺこら〜！
subtitles.english: Haa! Pekora!

subtitles.original: ぺこらちゃん！
subtitles.english: Pekora-chan!

subtitles.original: お誕生日おめでとう！
subtitles.english: Happy Birthday!

subtitles.original: ありがと〜！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: え、すご！新衣装じゃん！
subtitles.english: Wow, amazing! It's a new outfit!

subtitles.original: かわいい！
subtitles.english: Cute!

subtitles.original: じっくり見せてぺこよ
subtitles.english: Let us see it closely, peko.

subtitles.original: じっくり見せてご覧なさいよ
subtitles.english: Let us have a good look.

subtitles.original: 足元まで見せてよ
subtitles.english: Show us all the way down to your feet.

subtitles.original: お姫様だったんだね
subtitles.english: You really were a princess.

subtitles.original: ティアラもかぶっちゃって
subtitles.english: Even wearing a tiara.

subtitles.original: かわいい〜！
subtitles.english: So cute!

subtitles.original: うさぎに真珠だ
subtitles.english: Pearls for a rabbit.

subtitles.original: おい！ちょっと何見てんのよ！
subtitles.english: Hey! What are you looking at!

subtitles.original: もったいないわね
subtitles.english: What a waste.

subtitles.original: どういうことだよおい！
subtitles.english: What do you mean by that, hey!

subtitles.original: 拉致して連れて帰ろうかな
subtitles.english: I might just kidnap her and take her home.

subtitles.original: やめろやめろ
subtitles.english: Stop it, stop it.

subtitles.original: 髪型も可愛いね
subtitles.english: Your hairstyle is cute too.

subtitles.original: 編み込みみたいになってる
subtitles.english: It's like a braid.

subtitles.original: お花持ってる
subtitles.english: She's holding a flower.

subtitles.original: 人参のお花？
subtitles.english: A carrot flower?

subtitles.original: これ食べれそうぺこだけど
subtitles.english: This looks edible, peko.

subtitles.original: 食べないでね
subtitles.english: Don't eat it.

subtitles.original: みんな食べない？
subtitles.english: Does anyone want a bite?

subtitles.original: やめろやめろ
subtitles.english: Stop it, stop it.

subtitles.original: うさぎ食べたい！
subtitles.english: I want to eat the rabbit!

subtitles.original: みんな来てくれてありがと
subtitles.english: Thank you everyone for coming.

subtitles.original: いきなり締めようとしてる
subtitles.english: Trying to wrap it up already.

subtitles.original: 早すぎるでしょ
subtitles.english: That's way too early.

subtitles.original: まだだよまだ
subtitles.english: Not yet, not yet.

subtitles.original: え、もうそんな時間？
subtitles.english: Oh, is it that time already?

subtitles.original: 実はもうちょっと残ってるので
subtitles.english: Actually, there's a little bit more left.

subtitles.original: いろいろあるので
subtitles.english: Since there's various things.

subtitles.original: またみんなで遊ぼうや
subtitles.english: Let's play together again later.

subtitles.original: バイバイ！
subtitles.english: Bye-bye!

subtitles.original: え、ゲストなのに？
subtitles.english: Eh, even though we're guests?

subtitles.original: 居座りたい！
subtitles.english: I want to stay!

subtitles.original: 時間ギリギリまでいようとするんじゃないよ
subtitles.english: Don't try to stay until the very last second.

subtitles.original: 一緒にいたいよ〜
subtitles.english: We want to be with you~

subtitles.original: 帰りたくないよ〜
subtitles.english: I don't want to go home~

subtitles.original: ぺこら〜
subtitles.english: Pekora~

subtitles.original: みんな頑張ってね
subtitles.english: Good luck everyone.

subtitles.original: ありがとぺこ！
subtitles.english: Thank you peko!

subtitles.original: ちょっと自由すぎるぺこ
subtitles.english: They're a bit too free-spirited, peko.

subtitles.original: この後も歌とお知らせもあるので
subtitles.english: After this, there will be more songs and announcements.

subtitles.original: お楽しみに！バイバイ！
subtitles.english: Look forward to it! Bye-bye!

subtitles.original:
Synchrogazer
作詞 水樹奈々 作詞・作曲 上松範康(Elements Garden)
subtitles.english:
Synchrogazer
Lyrics by Nana Mizuki, Lyrics & Composition by Noriyasu Agematsu (Elements Garden)

subtitles.original: Listen to my song... Oh...
subtitles.english: Listen to my song... Oh...

subtitles.original: 僕の声は聞こえていますか？ Please tell me
subtitles.english: Can you hear my voice? Please tell me

subtitles.original: 答えのない虚構の空目指し Far away
subtitles.english: Aiming for a fictional sky with no answers, far away

subtitles.original: 言葉じゃ足りないから 僕のすべて受け止めて
subtitles.english: Because words aren't enough, take in everything of me

subtitles.original: 制御できない、したくないよ
subtitles.english: I can't control it, and I don't want to

subtitles.original: 初めて知る感覚
subtitles.english: A feeling I'm learning for the first time

subtitles.original: 君に歌うよ
subtitles.english: I'll sing to you

subtitles.original: 永遠の始まりを
subtitles.english: The beginning of eternity

subtitles.original: だから笑って 誰よりも熱く
subtitles.english: So smile, hotter than anyone else

subtitles.original: 誰よりも強く抱きしめるよ
subtitles.english: I'll hold you tighter than anyone else

subtitles.original: 震える心 揺さぶればいい
subtitles.english: If my heart trembles, let it shake
